channel.title: Superset on nanta - Data Engineering

item.title: Superset: Resolving Six User-Reported Issues
item.description: Our data governance team reported six issues they found while using Superset. From a missing .png extension on Slack screenshots to a CSV download 500 error caused by PostgreSQL’s idle_in_transaction_session_timeout killing the metadata DB connection mid-download. The trickiest one required tracing through RDS error logs to find that a 60-second timeout on the metadata database was cutting off large CSV exports.
